channel.title: Events Archive 2012 on Perth Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in Events Archive 2012 on Perth Linux Users Group

item.title: December Talk: Amazon Web Services by James Bromberger
item.description: Amazon Web Services Cloud recently launched in Sydney, Australia. Come and find out what it is, how you can use it, and whats new with the service.

item.title: November Talk: Linux on Large Clusters by Stuart Midgley
item.description: Stuart Midgley will be talking about his experiences and issues with managing a 25000 core cluster with 4 petabytes of storage.

item.title: October Talk: Python in Astronomy by Andrew Williams
item.description: Dr. Andrew Williams on Python use in astronomy, work with optical telescopes and digital cameras; and the Murchison Widefield Array

item.title: Software Freedom Day 2012
item.description: This year an excitable group of PLUGgers interested in proselytising software freedom to the wider community are throwing an awesome event for Software Freedom Day.

item.title: September Talk: Bitcoin by Leo Treasure
